page.title: 10Farm life in Blithfield
page.content: This farm is 162 acres, some of which is let for grass and is entirely beef cattle. It is run by just the farmer and his wife they do not employ any extra help. The old farm house is very large, having 6 spacious rooms downstairs and eight bedrooms upstairs and a big attic, there is also a large garden. Their four sons are now grown up and live away from home. Many visitors stay at the farm, some for a week or so and some just over night. Most visitors enjoy doing jobs to help out, much as painting, gardening or jam making. The house is connected to electricity and mains water and has cess pit. The downstair rooms are heated by open fires and the aga in the kitchen, upstairs there are electric fires when needed. They own a fridge, freezer, washing machine, dishwasher and all the usual domestic.
